General.Name: Zwipe AS
General.Description: Zwipe AS provides biometric card-based access control security solutions to enterprises and facilities in Norway and internationally. The company provides Zwipe Pay, a biometric payment card platform for card manufacturers to deliver their own biometric payment cards; and Zwipe Access, an advanced biometric smart card solution for access control. It also offers Zwipe Insights, which captures consumer payment habits and their views on biometric payment solutions; and Zwipe Experience services for banks, fintechs, and financial institutions for launching biometric payment cards. Zwipe AS was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.

2.Name: Mr. Eric  Mercer
2.Title: COO & CEO of Zwipe America Inc.
